results.title: Practical Gardening | Udemy
results.description: Learning everything about gardening from grassroots level.

results.title: Garden Design Level 2 | Udemy
results.description: Ideally, you will have a basic knowledge of the principles of Garden Design and have undertaken a Beginner's Guide to Garden Design. This course is for people that would like to deepen their understanding of garden design principles.

results.title: Gorgeous Garden Design (DIY Landscape Design You’ll Love) | Udemy
results.description: This is a beginner/intermediate level course in landscape architecture and design. You will be introduced to objective principles essential for developing strong design solutions, alongside incorporating various gardening elements to enhance the outdoor living environment.

results.title: The Beginner's Guide to Vegetable Gardening | Udemy
results.description: Learn where, when, and what to plant in your backyard garden to start growing your vegetables like a pro.

results.title: Best Agriculture Courses & Certificates [2025] | Coursera
results.description: Transform your career with Coursera's online Agriculture courses. Enroll for free, earn a certificate, and build job-ready skills on your schedule in the field of gardening and agriculture.
